Class ProjectViewFilterModel

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.model.ProjectViewFilterModel
public class ProjectViewFilterModel extends Object
Represents a model for filtering projects based on Neighborhood and flat type. This class is encapsulated within the user as an attribute to facilitate project filtering operations in ProjectView.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectViewFilterModel

      public ProjectViewFilterModel()
      Constructs a ProjectFilterModel instance with null filters. By default, no filtering is applied.

  • Method Details

    • setNeighborhood

      public void setNeighborhood(Neighborhood neighborhood)
      Sets the Neighborhood filter criterion.
      Parameters:
      neighborhood - The Neighborhood to filter projects by

    • setFlatType

      public void setFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Sets the flat type filter criterion.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to filter projects by

    • setNeighborhood

      public void setNeighborhood()
      Clears the Neighborhood filter by setting it to null. This effectively removes the Neighborhood filtering criterion.

    • setFlatType

      public void setFlatType()
      Clears the flat type filter by setting it to null. This effectively removes the flat type filtering criterion.

    • getNeighborhood

      public Neighborhood getNeighborhood()
      Gets the Neighborhood filter criterion.
      Returns:
      The Neighborhood used for filtering projects, or null if no filter is set.

    • getFlatType

      public FlatType getFlatType()
      Gets the flat type filter criterion.
      Returns:
      The flat type used for filtering projects, or null if no filter is set.
